raw_comment:
1. What do you notice? If your notice makes a claim, where in the graph is the evidence to support it? I notice that income and legacy makes a huge impact on your acceptance into elite colleges. 
2. What do you wonder? I wonder why your parents income will affect what colleges accept you. 
3. What impact does this have on you and your community? This has a lot of impact on me and my community because it is a critical time for juniors and seniors to work on their grades. There is a lot of pressure around GPA and extracurriculars, while there are a lot of outside factors that is out of students control. 
4. What's going on in this graph? Write a catchy headline that captures the graph's main idea.
"What is the deciding factor of college acceptance?"
ace_sentences: The graph shows acceptance into elite colleges.
Income has a large impact on acceptance into elite colleges.
Legacy status has a large impact on acceptance into elite colleges.
I wonder why the income of parents affects which colleges accept a student.
This situation has a large impact on me.
This situation has a large impact on my community.
It is a critical time for juniors to work on their grades.
It is a critical time for seniors to work on their grades.
There is a lot of pressure about GPA.
There is a lot of pressure about extracurricular activities.
Some outside factors are out of the control of students.
The headline is: What is the deciding factor of college acceptance?
